kindred.model

Class Attribute

  • Object
    • kindred.model.Attribute

  • public class Attribute
extends Object
    Class that defines a Unit's overall attributes that influence their performance during the game.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int agility
      Raises chance of evading an enemy Unit's attack.
      private int attack
      Raises damage caused by a Unit.
      private int currentHp
      Indicates a Unit's current hit points.
      private int defense
      Reduces damage received by a Unit.
      private int movement
      Indicates the maximum number of Tiles a Unit can move during each turn.
      private int range
      Indicates the maximum distance, in Tiles, that the Unit has to attack the opponent's Units.
      private int totalHp
      Indicates a Unit's total hit points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Attribute(int hp, int atk, int def, int agi, int mov, int rng)
      Constructs an Attribute.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAgility()
      Returns the Unit's agility value.
      int getAttack()
      Returns the Unit's attack value.
      int getCurrentHp()
      Returns the number of hit points remaining for the Unit.
      int getDefense()
      Returns the Unit's defense value.
      int getMovement()
      Returns the Unit's maximum movement per turn.
      int getRange()
      Returns the Unit's maximum range of attack.
      int getTotalHp()
      Returns the Unit's maximum hit points.
      void loseHp(int damage)
      Reduces the Unit's current hit points according to the specified amount of damage.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • totalHp

        private int totalHp
        Indicates a Unit's total hit points.

      • currentHp

        private int currentHp
        Indicates a Unit's current hit points. When it reaches zero, it is considered dead.

      • attack

        private int attack
        Raises damage caused by a Unit.

      • defense

        private int defense
        Reduces damage received by a Unit.

      • agility

        private int agility
        Raises chance of evading an enemy Unit's attack.

      • movement

        private int movement
        Indicates the maximum number of Tiles a Unit can move during each turn.

      • range

        private int range
        Indicates the maximum distance, in Tiles, that the Unit has to attack the opponent's Units.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Attribute

        public Attribute(int hp,
         int atk,
         int def,
         int agi,
         int mov,
         int rng)
        Constructs an Attribute.
        Parameters:
        hp - the Unit's total hit points
        atk - the Unit's attack points
        def - the Unit's defense points
        agi - the Unit's agility points
        mov - the Unit's maximum movement per turn
        rng - the Unit's maximum range

        Returns the number of hit points remaining for the Unit.
        Returns:
        the Unit's current hit points

      • loseHp

        public void loseHp(int damage)
        Reduces the Unit's current hit points according to the specified amount of damage.
        Parameters:
        damage - value to be subtracted from the Unit's current hit points
